'Reach Global Services Ltd.' is a subsidiary of Telstra International. Reach,
headquartered in Hong Kong, has interests in more than 40 submarine cables
(including AJC, APCN2, China-US, Japan-US, RNAL, Sea-Me-We 3) and international
satellite systems, mainly servicing the Asia Pacific area. Reach has operating
licences and landing rights in most major markets including Hong Kong, Japan,
Korea, Taiwan, Singapore, Australia, North America and Europe.
